dmca.title: Melaleuca claims defamation on 43rdstateblues
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. [Private]

I am writing to inform you that an internet site which you administer, found at http://www.43rdstateblues.com, contains statement about Melaleuca, Inc. ("Melaleuca" or "the Company"), its suit with Mr. Jeff Wasden, and its President and CEO Frank L. VanderSloot which are knowingly and intentionally false.  These statements are defamatory in violation of Idaho law.

Melaleuca has suffered damages due to your publication of this material and continues to suffer damages due to the continuing presence of these false materials on your site.  _The company demands that you remove any such defamatory materials within 24 hours form your receipt of this letter,_ and will not hesitate to resort to legal action to protect its interests.

Please respond to me confirming that all false and defamatory information regarding Melaleuca and/or Mr. VanderSloot has been removed from your website, and that you have taken steps to keep such material from being published in the future.  

We look forward to these postings being taken down within 24 hours.  If not, the legal process to hold you accountable for damages will proceed Monday morning, April 9th, at 9:00 a.m.

Sincerely, 
[private]
Vice President and General Counsel
